pages.title: Limiter Conduit
pages.text: The <item>Limiter Conduit/$ is used to limit the amount of <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/alchemy)reagents/$ flowing into a <item>$(l:essentials:alchemy/vessel)reaction vessel/$ from <item>$(l:essentials:alchemy/conduit)conduits/$- though they can be used with any <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/alchemy)alchemy/$ container.$(br2)They accept input from the back, and output through the front. A limit can be set by shift-right-clicking with a <item>$(l:essentials/wrench)wrench/$. They will not insert

any <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/alchemy)reagent/$ into the container they are outputting to beyond the configured limit.$(br2)This is useful for both preventing completely filling a <item>$(l:essentials:alchemy/vessel)reaction vessel/$ with a <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/alchemy)reagent/$, and for controlling the ratio of reagents for certain $(l:essentials:intro/alchemy)dangerous reactions/$ or making <item>$(l:essentials:alchemy/stones)advanced elemental reagents/$.$(br2)There is both a crystal and glass variant.$(br2)
